text: "Clumsy" is a 1997 alternative rock song by the Canadian alternative rock band Our Lady Peace and is the second single from their second studio album Clumsy, which was released in 1997. The song was written by Raine Maida and Mike Turner and was produced by Arnold Lanni. The song was featured on the soundtrack to the movie, I Know What You Did Last Summer. ==Meaning of the song== Category:Our Lady Peace songs Category:1997 songs
title: Clumsy (Our Lady Peace song)
